ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks friend for the idea, but unfortunately I tried this already and am not able to do the quest as I am apprehensive to the Dark Bargainers and once you are
ygData.messageBody:
thanks friend for the idea, but unfortunately I tried this already and am
not able to do the quest as I am apprehensive to the Dark Bargainers and
once you are apprehensive, both this quest you speak of and the red wine
quest are not possible.

Thanks anyway, friend

- Xinuilt

-----Original Message-----
From: John Wiese [mailto:jwiese@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 12:11 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Neriak Faction


From: "John Wiese" <jwiese@...>

Not sure if you have been told this one or not. But, turn in Greater
Light Stones or Light Stones. I did this early on and my faction in
Neriak is awesome. Everyone looks at me Kindly. If i continue to do
the quest I am sure I could get to warmly easy.

Make sure you turn them into the lady in So Ro.

Bril
lvl 35 Nercro
